      • create1DHisto

        public void create1DHisto(java.lang.String tabName,
                          int row,
                          int column,
                          java.lang.String histoName,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          java.lang.String titleX,
                          int binX,
                          double minX,
                          double maxX)
        Create a new 1D histogram plot
        Parameters:
        tabName - name of the tab
        row - row of the tab
        column - column of the tab
        histoName - histogram name (not displayed)
        title - histogram title
        titleX - histogram X-axis title
        binX - number of bins along X-axis
        minX - minimum value for X-axis
        maxX - maximum value for X-axis
        logY - true to have logarithmic Y-axis, false else

      • create1DHistoBySector

                                  java.lang.String titleX,
                                  int binX,
                                  double minX,
                                  double maxX)
        Create a row of 1D histogram plots (create numberOfSectors+1 histograms since the first column is supposed to be the sum of all sectors)
        Parameters:
        tabName - name of the tab
        row - row of the tab
        numberOfColumns - number of sectors
        histoName - histogram name (not displayed)
        title - histogram title
        titleX - histogram X-axis title
        binX - number of bins along X-axis
        minX - minimum value for X-axis
        maxX - maximum value for X-axis
        logY - true to have logarithmic Y-axis, false else

                        double weight)
        Fill histogram with the given values
        Parameters:
        histoName - name of the histogram to fill
        valueX - value along X-axis
        valueY - value along Y-axis
        weight - weight of the point

                        int row,
                        int column,

      • addStatBox

        public void addStatBox(java.lang.String tabName,
                       int row,
                       int column,
                       int statBoxValue)
        Add a stat box for a given pad
        Parameters:
        tabName - name of the tab
        row - row of the tab
        column - column of the tab
        statBoxValue - elements to display in the stat box (binary mask representing Integral/ Overflow/ Underflow/ RMS/ Mean/ Entries/ Name). For instance : 1110 will display RMS/ Mean/ Entries and 1001111 will display Integral/ RMS/ Mean/ Entries/ Title)

      • addStatBox

        public void addStatBox(java.lang.String tabName,
                       int row,
                       int column,
                       int title,
                       int entries,
                       int mean,
                       int rms,
                       int underflow,
                       int overflow,
                       int integral)
        Add a stat box for a given pad
        Parameters:
        tabName - name of the tab
        row - row of the tab
        column - column of the tab
        title - 1 to display title, 0 else
        entries - 1 to display entries, 0 else
        mean - 1 to display mean, 0 else
        rms - 1 to display rms, 0 else
        underflow - 1 to display underflow, 0 else
        overflow - 1 to display overflow, 0 else
        integral - 1 to display integral, 0 else
